nl.esciencecenter.octopus.jobs.Jobs

    Package Description
    nl.esciencecenter.octopus

    • Uses of Jobs in nl.esciencecenter.octopus.util

      Methods in nl.esciencecenter.octopus.util with parameters of type Jobs 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static Scheduler Utils.getLocalScheduler(Jobs jobs)
      Returns a Scheduler that can be used to run jobs locally.
      static Scheduler Utils.newScheduler(Jobs jobs, String scheme)
      Create a Scheduler for the given scheme, but without using a location, credential, or properties.
